addVestingSchedule(address,uint256,uint2.details: Adds a new vesting schedule for a beneficiary.

params._amount: Total number of tokens to be vested over the duration.
params._beneficiary: Address of the beneficiary to whom vesting tokens are allocated.
params._duration: Duration in seconds of the entire vesting period.
params._start: Unix timestamp for when vesting starts.

releasableAmount(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens that have not yet been released but are releasable as of the latest block.

params.beneficiary: Address of the beneficiary checking their releasable amount.

releaseFor(address).details: Releases vested tokens to a specified beneficiary.

params.beneficiary: Address of the beneficiary claiming their vested tokens.
